TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː s k ɑː s ts ɛ l æ s æ t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð ɪ s ts ɪ n s w ɪ t h æ f ɹ ʌ m d ɪ s ts ə s ɪ s k uː n s ɔ f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p iː z f aɪ f s ts ɪ k t æ v f ɚ d l uː tʃ z æ n m eɪ b iː ɐ s n æ x ʌ v h æ b ɹ ɔ d æ s v ɑː v w iː ɑː s oʊ n ɪ d ɐ s m ɑː t l æ s t ɪ k s n æ s æ n ɐ b ɪ ɡ ts aɪ f ɹ ʌ m ə d ɪ b ɪ ɡ t aɪ f ɹ ʌ m d ɪ s k ɪ ʃ iː k æ n ʃ iː k æ ŋ k oʊ p d ɪ s ts æ ŋ s ɪ ŋ t uː d ɪ ɪ n t ɪ d ɪ ɹ ɛ z b æ k s æ n w iː ʌ z iː ɡ oʊ m iː t æ ə n ɛ z ð ɪ æ d ɪ ɹ ɛ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
